TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted...the world is now the USSR post collapse

I wish P-day way this week

Granted, economy colapse.

I wish to time-warp

Granted, you time warp to being an old age pensioner.

I wish to be President of the United States

Granted, but 2 weeks in the US is invaded by china for lack of payments on the dept.

I wish for gold bars.

Granted, it's only chocolate wrapped in shiny yellow candy wrapper.

I wish to be more creative

Granted, but there is blood on the walls, your cake is made out of random internal organs, and Jeb is your Muse. (Don't hug me I'm scared reff)

I wish the internet would calm the fudge down.

granted, now nothing else will happen again

I wish for a device that brings my imaginations to life in detail, if not detailed enough, it will show up on my vision where I can design it further

Granted. Instead of your imagination however, it is some random creepy person. Sorry bout' that

I wish for my hot chocolate not to spill

Granted. Instead of your imagination however, it is some random creepy person. Sorry bout' that

I wish for my hot chocolate not to spill

Granted, your blood spills out of your skin

I wish corruption never exists

Granted, It exists inside you >:3

I wish for a wish that makes a wish that wishes a wish that wishes up a wish that wishes me world domination >:|

Granted, but it gets stuck half way through that sentence.

I wish I had the experience jobs wanted.

granted, but its only for the job you hate.

I wish I would sober up.

Granted, but upon smelling alcohol again you will instantly turn into a large beanbag chair for 3 hours

I wish for a time-turner.

Granted, but you can only ever use it once. Enjoy inevitable regret.

I wish for omniscience.

That wish does not even need to be corrupted. You now perceive all of the anguish and pain experienced by entirety of the human race. All of the suffering in the Philiphines, every death that is going on every second of every day. Apart from that the whole universe is now incredibly dull and boring, since you know every detail and facet of it down to the smallest detail. Enjoy the hell.

I wish for more coffee.

Granted, but the coffee is so hot that the instant you touch the cup, your arm bursts into flame.

I wish I could warp the laws of physics.

Granted You are able to do it but the machine you are using collapses into a black hole killing you

I wish could have quick save IRL

Granted, but I steal it from you. Somehow.

I wish I could live in a bubble underwater. Pineapples welcome.

Granted. The air isn't infinite and you eventually suffocate.

I wish Youtube didn't have the new sucky layout.

Granted, but now all the videos are broken instead.

I wish I could play piano.

Granted your fingers magically disappear while playing

I wish the old youtube comment section was back because they made it so people can post links!

Granted your fingers magically disappear while playing

I wish the old youtube comment section was back because they made it so people can post links!

Granted....but Google buys Club Penguin and forces you to have a Club penguin account to comment.

I wish that Planet Remina would become my pet (And I would have planets and solar systems to feed it and a Jupiter sized cage to hold it)

Granted, but the galaxy unites in a war against you out of fear of it escaping

I wish I was in control of a space program

granted it the russian one and you just made them go bankrupt

I wish for more tolerance and love

granted, you have nothing else

I wish for potato
